name: Spontaneous Metafocus, Mythic

sections.body: You can change which spell your Spontaneous Metafocus feat applies to each morning when you restore your expended spell slots. The spell it applies to can be of any level, but it must be a legal selection for the Spontaneous Metafocus feat.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You can gain this feat multiple times. The effects do not stack. Each time you take this feat, it applies to a different non-mythic Spontaneous Metafocus feat.
sections.name: Special

description: You apply metamagic to your spells with greater ease than do other spontaneous casters.
